content.en: Customer segmentation: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms for customer segmentation in different industries. These algorithms, such as clustering and multi-criteria decision making, are used to analyze customer data and identify distinct groups based on their characteristics and behaviors. By utilizing these algorithms, businesses can gain valuable insights into their customers and tailor their strategies accordingly.
content.da: Kundesegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til kundesegmentering i forskellige brancher. Disse algoritmer, såsom klyngeanalyse og multi-kriterie beslutningstagning, anvendes til at analysere kundedata og identificere forskellige grupper baseret på deres karakteristika og adfærd. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan virksomheder opnå værdifuld indsigt i deres kunder og tilpasse deres strategier derefter.
